mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_pw, user_email, user_name, user_local) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{userLocal});
mapper.select: SELECT user.user_idx, book.book_idx, book.book_title, book.book_price, book.sold_yn, comment.comment_idx, comment.comment_content, comment.create_date FROM user, book, comment WHERE user.user_idx = comment.user_idx = #{userIdx} AND book.book_idx = comment.book_idx AND comment.deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY comment.comment_idx DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT user.user_idx, book.book_idx, book.book_title, book.book_price, book.deleted_yn, book.sold_yn, book_recommend.recommend_idx FROM user, book, book_recommend WHERE user.user_idx = book_recommend.user_idx = #{userIdx} AND book.book_idx = book_recommend.book_idx AND book.deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY book_recommend.recommend_idx DESC;
